channel.title: hugo on YB Gwon's ...
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on YB Gwon's ...

item.title: hugo 사용법
item.description: 1 설치 $ brew install hugo 2 사이트 생성 $ hugo new site hugo 3 테마 적용 테마 파일을 선택한 뒤 submodule 로 받아온다. $ cd hugo $ git init $ git submodule add https://github.

item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description: Step 1. Install Hugo Goto hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your os and architecture. Save it somewhere specific as we will be using it in the next step.
